# üöÄ GPU Guide for Picking the Right Models

Not sure which model to grab based on your GPU?
Here‚Äôs a fun little guide to keep things simple!

---

## üü¶ Got an old **4GB NVIDIA GPU**?

No worries ‚Äî small cards can still make magic!
Try this efficient, lightweight model:

üëâ **DreamShaper**
[https://civitai.com/models/4384/dreamshaper](https://civitai.com/models/4384/dreamshaper)

---

## üü© Rocking an **8GB NVIDIA GPU**?

You‚Äôll want to stick with **SDXL-type models or smaller**.
Here‚Äôs a solid option:

üëâ **SDXL Model**
[https://civitai.com/models/112902?modelVersionId=354657](https://civitai.com/models/112902?modelVersionId=354657)

---

## üüß Flexing a **16GB+ NVIDIA GPU**?

Okay powerhouse, now you‚Äôre ready for the big stuff ‚Äî like **Flux**.

Try this **All-in-One fp8-Schnell** version:

üëâ **Flux AiO (fp8-Schnell)**
[https://civitai.com/models/637170?modelVersionId=714945](https://civitai.com/models/637170?modelVersionId=714945)

---

# ü§ñ Quick Setup Guide (Discord Bot Token)

### 1. Get Your Bot Token

1. Go to: [https://discord.com/developers/applications](https://discord.com/developers/applications)
2. Select your application (or create a new one)
3. Open **Bot** in the left sidebar
4. Click **Reset Token** ‚Üí copy the new token
5. Paste it into the `set_new_token` field in the node
6. Under **Privileged Gateway Intents**, enable:

   * ‚úÖ **Message Content Intent**

---

### 2. Invite Your Bot to Your Server

1. Go to **OAuth2 ‚Üí URL Generator**
2. Under *Scopes*, check:

   * ‚úîÔ∏è `bot`
3. Under *Bot Permissions*, enable:

   * ‚úîÔ∏è Send Messages
   * ‚úîÔ∏è Read Message History
   * ‚úîÔ∏è Attach Files
   * ‚úîÔ∏è Add Reactions
4. Copy the generated URL
5. Open it, select your server, and invite the bot

---

### ‚úîÔ∏è Final Notes

* After you enter your token once and queue the node, the token will be saved securely and appear masked next time.
* **IMPORTANT:** Make sure to set the **Run Mode** to **Instant** ‚Äî click the small arrow next to the **Run** button and select **Instant** so the node processes messages immediately.

üéâ You‚Äôre all set!
